snippet.title: Crime Wave longplay w/ cheats (Apple II - Penguin software)
snippet.description:
Crime Wave (http://graphicsmagician.com/polarware/arcade.htm) was an action game published by Penguin Software in 1983 for the Apple ][. The player controls a police car, which needs to catch the thieves amid crazy traffic in the city. Hope you enjoy the longplay!

PS: The # of lives is stored at address $85. You can get infinite lives by changing $9D89 from C6 85 to A9 01. The shield timer is stored at address $1900. You can get unlimited shield by changing $1947 from E9 01 to E9 00.

Credits:
Cover art - graphicsmagician.com
